biscotti.collect

Class Lists2

  • java.lang.Object
    • biscotti.collect.Lists2

  • public class Lists2
extends Object
    Static utility methods which operate on or return Lists.
    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov
    See Also:
    Lists

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <E> int indexOf(List<E> list, Predicate<? super E> predicate)
      Returns the index of the first occurrence in the specified list of an element which satisfies the given predicate, or -1 if there is no such element.
      static <E> int lastIndexOf(List<E> list, Predicate<? super E> predicate)
      Returns the index of the last occurrence in the specified list of an element which satisfies the given predicate, or -1 if there is no such element.
      static <E> LinkedList<E> newLinkedList(E first, E... rest)
      Creates a LinkedList containing the specified initial elements.

      • indexOf

        public static <E> int indexOf(List<E> list,
              Predicate<? super E> predicate)
        Returns the index of the first occurrence in the specified list of an element which satisfies the given predicate, or -1 if there is no such element.

        Note: If the specified list allows null elements the given predicate must be able to handle null elements as well to avoid a NullPointerException.

        Parameters:
        list - the specified list
        predicate - the given predicate
        Returns:
        the index of the first occurrence in the specified list of an element which satisfies the given predicate, or -1 if there is no such element

      • lastIndexOf

        public static <E> int lastIndexOf(List<E> list,
                  Predicate<? super E> predicate)
        Returns the index of the last occurrence in the specified list of an element which satisfies the given predicate, or -1 if there is no such element.

        Note: If the specified list allows null elements the given predicate must be able to handle null elements as well to avoid a NullPointerException.

        Parameters:
        list - the specified list
        predicate - the given predicate
        Returns:
        the index of the last occurrence in the specified list of an element which satisfies the given predicate, or -1 if there is no such element
